definitions.title: vb. Pa.
definitions.body: inquire, seek (only Ezr) (Targum Syr.; v. BH);—Pf. 3 mpl. [[בַּקַּ֫רוּ]] Ezr 4:19, Ezr 6:1; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְבַקַּר]] Ezr 4:15; Inf. [[לְבַקָּרָה]] Ezr 7:14;—
inquire, c. [[עַל]] (rei) concerning Ezr 7:14; c. subj. indef., = pass., Ezr 4:19 search was made, so Ezr 6:1, Ezr 4:15.

definitions.title: Hithpa.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתְבַּקַּר]] Ezr 5:17, impers., let search be made.
